meteoroids.Meteoroids.controllers.gamestates

Class GameStateMachine

  • java.lang.Object
    • meteoroids.Meteoroids.controllers.gamestates.GameStateMachine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameStateGameOver, GameStateGotHighScore, GameStateHighScores, GameStateMainMenu, GameStatePause, GameStatePlay, Level

    public abstract class GameStateMachine
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller
    Abstract class for different game states. GameStateMachines are used for different states in the game. Main menu, different levels, high scores screen etc. all have their own state.
    Author:
    vpyyhtia
